sentences.sContent: The cheaper drugs are just as effective in treating arthritis.
sentences.sCn: 较便宜的药品对治疗关节炎同样有效。

sentences.sContent: the painting’s highly effective use of colour
sentences.sCn: 绘画中得心应手的色彩运用

sentences.sContent: Training is often much less effective than expected.
sentences.sCn: 训练的效果往往远低于预期。

sentences.sContent: the most effective ways of reducing inner city congestion
sentences.sCn: 减少旧城区交通拥挤最有效的办法

sentences.sContent: ...And that really was quite effective in terms of reducing the number of smokers...
...Existing social networks can be more effective in creating change in people's behaviour...
...To find effective solutions to climate change...
...Using existing civil society structures or networks is a more effective way of creating change...
...necessary that some effective measures be taken to prevent ourselves from being misled by junk information...
...that two drugs are about equally effective in treating macular degeneration...
...Fear can be an effective way to change behavior...
...nothing can be more effective than a warm smile in bringing people closer...

...it conveys a thought-provoking notion that we should always be friendly and polite to other people. First and foremost，a smile proves to be the most effective way to break the ice between two strangers...

synos.tran: [数]有效的，起作用的；实际的，实在的；给人深刻印象

phrases.pCn: 有成本效益的；划算的；成本效率

words.tran: 有效地，生效地；有力地；实际上
[生理] 效应器；[遗] 效应物；操纵装置

trans.tranOther: successful, and working in the way that was intended
